name: Crab, Samurai
description: The Crab Samurai is a robust creature with a solid Armor Class and a significant health pool. It has a uniquely armored shell and wields a Crustaceous Sword, making it a formidable melee opponent.
memorable: It possesses the ability to grapple opponents with its powerful claws and has various combat stances that enhance its capabilities.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory and defeat intruders.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other aquatic or marshy creatures.
environment: Aquatic or marshy environments, often near water bodies.
strengths: High Strength for inflicting damage and exceptional durability.
weaknesses: Limited Dexterity makes it less evasive in combat.
attacks: Can make multiple melee attacks including a damaging sword strike and grappling with powerful claws.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to grapple opponents tightly, significantly restricting their movement.
equipment: Crustaceous Sword used for melee attacks.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings effectively.
skills: Proficient in Perception, granting it a passive perception of 15.
additional_information: Amphibious, can breathe air and water.
Immunity to being charmed or frightened.
Can adopt various stances to enhance combat abilities.
Resistant to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
test_queries: samurai crab with strong melee attacks
unique crab with powerful claws and sword
robust crab that can breathe underwater
